roleset.name: cause to come to a stop
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. Comparison to shut_down.05.

example.name: passive, arg1
example.text: [The entire park]-1 was shutdown *-1 and 125 visitors and 17 staff members were held in lockdown at the park 's Jackson Visitor Center .

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: They shutdown the reformist press, jailed outspoken journalists, attacked student dormitories, and made all efforts to turn back the wheels and recreate the Islamic Republic's earlier political and social mosaic.
